languages.text: "Ты мне угрожаешь? Мне сложно понимать убогие метафоры вашей расы, особенно те, которые касаются угроз — уж больно вы нестрашные. Если это была угроза — я не испытал трепета".

"Was that a threat? I struggle to follow your kind's pitiful metaphors, especially those that are supposed to sound threatening — you are simply incapable of inspiring fear. If that was an attempt at intimidation, I remain unshaken."
languages.original_text: "Ты мне угрожаешь? Мне сложно понимать убогие метафоры вашей расы, особенно те, которые касаются угроз — уж больно вы нестрашные. Если это была угроза — я не испытал трепета".

traits.locale_text: "Was that a threat? I struggle to follow your kind's pitiful metaphors, especially those that are supposed to sound threatening — you are simply incapable of inspiring fear. If that was an attempt at intimidation, I remain unshaken."

"Was that a threat? I struggle to follow your kind's pitiful metaphors, especially those that are supposed to sound threatening — you are simply incapable of inspiring fear. If that was an attempt at intimidation, I remain unshaken."

"Was that a threat? I struggle to follow your kind's pitiful metaphors, especially those that are supposed to sound threatening — you are simply incapable of inspiring fear. If that was an attempt at intimidation, I remain unshaken."

languages.text: 「それは脅しか？どうにもお前たちの哀れな比喩…特に、私を脅そうとしているようなものは理解に苦しむ。お前たちには、恐怖を呼び起こすほどの力もなかろうに。それが脅しのつもりならば、私が揺らぐことはない」
languages.original_text: "Was that a threat? I struggle to follow your kind's pitiful metaphors, especially those that are supposed to sound threatening — you are simply incapable of inspiring fear. If that was an attempt at intimidation, I remain unshaken."

traits.locale_text: 「それは脅しか？どうにもお前たちの哀れな比喩…特に、私を脅そうとしているようなものは理解に苦しむ。お前たちには、恐怖を呼び起こすほどの力もなかろうに。それが脅しのつもりならば、私が揺らぐことはない」

languages.text: “这是在威胁我吗？我很难理解你们这种可悲的比喻，尤其是那种听起来像是威胁的比喻，你根本没办法激发我的恐惧。如果你这是在威胁我的话，那你恐怕吓不到我。”
languages.original_text: "Was that a threat? I struggle to follow your kind's pitiful metaphors, especially those that are supposed to sound threatening — you are simply incapable of inspiring fear. If that was an attempt at intimidation, I remain unshaken."

traits.locale_text: “这是在威胁我吗？我很难理解你们这种可悲的比喻，尤其是那种听起来像是威胁的比喻，你根本没办法激发我的恐惧。如果你这是在威胁我的话，那你恐怕吓不到我。”

languages.text: « Était-ce une menace ? Je peine à suivre les pathétiques métaphores de votre espèce, tout particulièrement celles qui se veulent menaçantes. Vous êtes tout simplement incapables d'inspirer la peur. Si vous tentiez par là de m'intimider, sachez qu'il n'en est rien. »
languages.original_text: "Was that a threat? I struggle to follow your kind's pitiful metaphors, especially those that are supposed to sound threatening — you are simply incapable of inspiring fear. If that was an attempt at intimidation, I remain unshaken."

traits.locale_text: « Était-ce une menace ? Je peine à suivre les pathétiques métaphores de votre espèce, tout particulièrement celles qui se veulent menaçantes. Vous êtes tout simplement incapables d'inspirer la peur. Si vous tentiez par là de m'intimider, sachez qu'il n'en est rien. »

languages.text: «¿Eso era una amenaza? Me cuesta entender las lamentables metáforas de tu especie, especialmente las que tienen como objetivo amenazar. Sois completamente incapaces de infundir temor. Por lo tanto, si eso era un intento de intimidación, ha fracasado».
languages.original_text: "Was that a threat? I struggle to follow your kind's pitiful metaphors, especially those that are supposed to sound threatening — you are simply incapable of inspiring fear. If that was an attempt at intimidation, I remain unshaken."

traits.locale_text: «¿Eso era una amenaza? Me cuesta entender las lamentables metáforas de tu especie, especialmente las que tienen como objetivo amenazar. Sois completamente incapaces de infundir temor. Por lo tanto, si eso era un intento de intimidación, ha fracasado».

languages.text: "War das eine Drohung? Es fällt mir schwer, Euren armseligen Metaphern zu folgen, vor allem, wenn sie bedrohlich klingen sollen ... Ihr seid einfach nicht in der Lage, Angst zu verbreiten. Falls das ein Versuch war, mich einzuschüchtern, hat es nicht funktioniert."
languages.original_text: "Was that a threat? I struggle to follow your kind's pitiful metaphors, especially those that are supposed to sound threatening — you are simply incapable of inspiring fear. If that was an attempt at intimidation, I remain unshaken."

traits.locale_text: "War das eine Drohung? Es fällt mir schwer, Euren armseligen Metaphern zu folgen, vor allem, wenn sie bedrohlich klingen sollen ... Ihr seid einfach nicht in der Lage, Angst zu verbreiten. Falls das ein Versuch war, mich einzuschüchtern, hat es nicht funktioniert."

languages.text: "Bu bir tehdit mi? Türünün zavallı metaforlarını algılamakta zorlanıyorum. Özellikle de kulağa tehditkâr gelenleri. Korku salma becerisinden yoksunsunuz. Bu bir gözdağı verme girişimi idiyse bende herhangi bir etki yaratmadı."
languages.original_text: "Was that a threat? I struggle to follow your kind's pitiful metaphors, especially those that are supposed to sound threatening — you are simply incapable of inspiring fear. If that was an attempt at intimidation, I remain unshaken."

traits.locale_text: "Bu bir tehdit miydi? Türünün zavallı metaforlarını algılamakta zorlanıyorum. Özellikle de kulağa tehditkâr gelenleri. Korku salma becerisinden yoksunsunuz. Bu bir gözdağı verme girişimi idiyse, bende herhangi bir etki yaratmadı."
